name: Cryohazard
description:
SLEEP WHEN YOU'RE DEAD.

Inspired by classic point and click games, Choose Your Own Adventure books, and B-grade horror films, Cryohazard is a short story of waking from cryogenic sleep in a dilapidated research facility full of mystery, mayhem, and monstrous mutants.  Multiple endings and numerous gruesome deaths are abound in this game designed for the original Game Boy, compatible with emulators and real hardware.

Controls (including web browser controls):

D-pad (Arrow Keys) - cursor movement

A button (Z key) - interact, use items

Start button (Enter key) - open inventory menu (during exploration mode)

The ROM file should run on any software or hardware that can play original Game Boy games.  The most accurate emulator of choice is BGB.

DISCLAIMER: This game contains depictions of graphic violence and gore.  Viewer discretion advised.
